channel.title: elizaOS Daily Intelligence
channel.description: Daily facts and insights from the elizaOS ecosystem

item.title: elizaOS Intelligence: 2025-12-16
item.description:
Summary: Community focus centered on token migration logistics and credibility signals (Kraken listing on Dec 19; migration delays and a reported migration-site compromise), alongside steady engineering progress on cloud enablement, authentication, and developer workflow automation.

GitHub Activity:

  • feat(auth): implement JWT authentication and user management (open)
  • feat: Unified API - serverless - nodejs (merged)
  • fix(plugin-sql): migrate to messageService API and auto-create PGLite directories (merged)
  • feat: Add ElizaOS Cloud as Default AI Provider in CLI (merged)
  • Shaw/chore/deslop (merged)

Community Highlights:

  • #ðŸ’¬-discussion: Primary discussion centered on AI16Zâ†’ElizaOS migration mechanics and a key credibility catalyst: Kraken listing scheduled for Dec 19 with a 1:6 distribution ratio for Nov 11 snapshot holders. Communit...
  • #ðŸ’¬-coders: Two parallel engineering threads: (1) a Polymarket tracking agent was built, writing bets into Neon and deployed to GitHub and Fly.io (next step: tighten conversational behavior), and (2) persistent l...
  • #core-devs: Core developers compared AI-assisted development workflows (Cursor Opus, multi-instance prompting across machines), discussed virtualization/worktree/container strategies to manage parallel AI session...

item.title: elizaOS Intelligence: 2025-12-15
item.description:
Summary: Community attention centered on AI16Zâ†’ElizaOS token migration friction (notably Bithumb delays) and an urgent, unverified claim that the migration site was compromised and used to drain tokens. In parallel, engineering discussions emphasized cloud-platform rollout and quality/stability improvements (SQL fixes, auth foundations, and tighter PR validation expectations).

GitHub Activity:

  • Eliza Cloud Integration, add MCP + A2A service starter, integrate CLI and starter projects tight (open)
  • feat(auth): implement JWT authentication and user management (open)
  • feat: Unified API - serverless - nodejs (merged)
  • .eliza needed or plugin-sql crashes, should autocreate (closed)
  • Docs (closed)

  • #ðŸ¥‡-partners: Proposal to repurpose the partners channel into an 'Eliza-Alpha' preview channel for cloud demos/teasers, inviting strategic non-holders to test and amplify (especially if X access returns). A core me...

item.title: elizaOS Intelligence: 2025-12-14
item.description:
Summary: elizaOS discussions centered on accelerating Eliza Cloud toward a full createâ†’publishâ†’monetizeâ†’promote loop (with SEO, ads, and social publishing integrations) while users surfaced practical friction around token migration via hardware wallets and plugin/config errors. GitHub activity (month-to-date) indicates heavy platform hardening plus major platform-enabling workstreams (cloud integration, unified API, and JWT-based multi-tenant auth).

item.title: elizaOS Intelligence: 2025-12-13
item.description:
Summary: Community focus split between immediate developer UX issues (missing AI plugin causing TEXT_LARGE errors; plugin install failures likely due to outdated packages) and broader ecosystem concerns (token migration issues on Bithumb and price anxiety) alongside ongoing platform hardening and major feature work (Cloud integration, TypeScript/build stabilization, JWT auth/multi-tenant direction).

GitHub Activity:

  • Eliza Cloud Integration, add MCP + A2A service starter, integrate CLI and starter projects tight (open)
  • fix: resolve TypeScript build errors in every packages - first step (open)
  • feat(auth): implement JWT authentication and user management (open)
  • feat: Add ElizaOS Cloud as Default AI Provider in CLI (open)
  • fix(plugin-sql): migrate to messageService API and auto-create PGLite directories (open)

  • #ðŸ’¬-coders: A user reported TEXT_LARGE errors even for short prompts; root cause was identified as missing AI inference plugin registration (e.g., OpenAI). Follow-on OpenAI plugin install failures were attributed...
  • #ðŸ’¬-discussion: Mostly casual chat (memes/profile pictures) with minor product chatter: 'Kled app release' mentioned without details; a user suggested ElizaOS can interact with NFTs; brief MOCA reference; 'how to red...
  • #ðŸ¥‡-partners: A brief mention of 'Business Eliza' suggests partner interest in a business-focused Eliza variant, but without implementation detail....

item.title: elizaOS Intelligence: 2025-12-11
item.description:
Summary: A critical security vulnerability was discovered in elizaOS allowing attackers to extract secrets via API endpoints, while ongoing plugin issues with SQL and Twitter components continue to affect users.

  • feat(auth): implement JWT authentication and user management (open)

  • #core-devs: A critical security vulnerability was discovered where server doesn't require ELIZA_SERVER_AUTH_TOKEN, allowing attackers to extract secrets via API endpoints. The issue stems from process.env being d...
